org.lindbergframework.exception
Class LindbergException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              org.lindbergframework.exception.LindbergException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BeanException, ConfigurationException, CoreException, IllegalStateContextException, NonUniqueRowException, NoSuchMethodOrPropertyException, PersistenceException, ReflectionException, ServiceException
public class LindbergException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

Base exception of lindbergframewrok. This exception adds several error messages. Contains utilitary methods to manipulate this messages.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
See Also:
